caption:
HOME | THE PREMISE | DESIGNATIONS | APP FORM | CLAIMS | SKELETONS

                                        Order born from the wrath of chaos

Chicago Illinois, a city rebuilt and protected by PRIME. It is an organization tasked with policing both the Conduit species itself and maintaining the peace between it and mankind. Having bought out the privatized contract for law enforcement throughout all of Chicago; they have kept the peace within the city. Well, for the most part. The Mavericks, a group that has seen PRIME’s methods and control have begun to rebel against the organization. They Are willing to do anything to maintain their freedom and remove PRIME from the city. They are not alone, however, and when motivations within the city collide; everyone has to pick a side, even if its the wrong one.

                                                                                          CHAOS WILL ALWAYS TRIUMPH OVER ORDER

SEQUENCE is a mutant/abilities roleplay. This group contains mature themes and is rated as such. We accept OCs and Skeleton Canon characters. We concern ourselves with our members enjoying themselves having a great place to plot, post and have fun with each other. If this sounds right up your alley, feel free to check us out and ask any questions you might have.

     Accepting within twenty four hours of receiving application!

summary: Dating Steve Rogers/Captain America would include...
title: Dating Steve Rogers/Captain America would include...
body:
(The Picture and gif above are not mine!!!!! I just searched for a Captain America gif and a Captain America picture and ^^ is what I picked!!!!!)

  • You 2 meet before the Battle of New York.
  • He’d be so shy at first.

Seriously, he’d blush a lot!

  • For your first date, he took you to a little restaurant that looked like one from the 40’s.

The two of you spent the whole time talking, laughing, and getting to know each other better.

  • He’d hold doors open for you and open your car door etc. He’d be such a gentleman.
  • He’d take you out dancing.
  • The 2 of you would always be hugging or kissing each other.
  • So. Many. Cuddles.
  • Getting teased by the others if they walk into the kitchen and see you hugging or kissing (mainly by Sam, Bucky, and Tony).

“Can’t you two do that in your bedroom?”

  • Cuddling in bed while you watch movies/TV shows.
  • Massages.
  • He’d be very protective.
  • Joining him for his morning runs.
  • Training with him and teasing him if you’re winning.

“Come on, Cap, you have do better than that.”
“Alright, it’s on now.”

  • Going to Coney Island together.
  • He’d hold your hand while you walk down the street or even in the car if you were just going for a drive.
  • Cooking together.
  • So many compliments.

“How did I get so lucky as to have someone as amazing as you in my life?“

  • Sweet and gentle kisses when you’re on dates or at Tony’s parties.
  • Passionate and ‘I can’t keep my hands off you’ kisses when one of you gets back from missions or if you’re alone.
  • When you first had sex, he was very nervous ‘cause he’d never done it before.
  • He wouldn’t be as nervous the next time though, because he’d be so much more comfortable.
  • Playful glares when you swear.

“Language.”

  • Both of you have so many pet names for each other.

You - “Doll.” “Sweetheart.” “Babe/Baby.” “Gorgeous.”
Steve - “Cap/Captain.” “Stevie.” “Handsome.” "Soldier.”

  • Being close to Bucky and Sam.
  • Comforting each other after a hard day or after a extremely hard mission.
  • Always being there for each other, no matter what the situation is.
  • Staying up all night and just talking.
  • Always being able to make each other laugh or smile.
  • Nothing can come between the 2 of you.
  • Eventually moving in together in an apartment in Brooklyn.
  • Talking about the possibility of a family and maybe even marriage.
  • “I love you so much Stevie.”

“I love you too, baby girl.”

  • Steve always making sure you never get hurt.
  • Everyone would love you, all the Avengers would be super protective of you.

Certain avengers (Tony and Natasha) would constantly want to be around you because you’re awesome (and Steve would get kind of jealous that they have your time but he would never show it).

  • He would love carrying you around, even if it’s for no reason.
  • Falling asleep on his chest.
  • Sitting together at Avenger meetings, holding hands under the table.
  • Him looking at you lovingly with those adoring blue eyes.
  • Him finding every excuse to hold your hand.
  • Steve worrying about others using you against him.

“If you were ever harmed because of me (Y/N), I could never forgive myself…”
“That’s never going to happen.”

  • Falling helplessly in love with him.
  • “I’m so glad I met you.”
  • Comforting each other when either of you has a nightmare.
  • Holding each other close at night.
  • Steve always being the warm one, so you steal both his heat and all of the covers. He never seems to mind or mention it.
  • You getting jealous easily.

“Have you not noticed the endless parade of girls staring at you all day. Especially your butt.”
“I don’t even care about those other girls. I’ve only got eyes for you, darling.”

  • If it’s cold then he’ll drape his jacket around your shoulders without saying a word.
  • Calling him ‘Captain’ just to annoy him.
  • You can’t stop staring at him during training.
  • Lots of soft kisses on the back of your hand.
  • You fussing over him when he gets even the smallest of injuries on a mission.
  • You teaching Steve how to dance, since he’s never really danced with anyone before.
  • Making inappropriate, sexual comments that he doesn’t understand at first and you watching his face turn bright red once he realizes what you said.
  • You always stealing his leather jacket because it smells like him.
  • Cuddling and reading books on rainy days.
  • Him twirling you around while dancing.
  • Him brushing your hair from your face and smiling softly down at you while you two are doing the ;) frickle frackle ;)
  • You watching him sleep when you wake up earlier than him because he looks so peaceful when he’s asleep.
  • Him making you breakfast in bed.
  • Him blushing whenever you kiss his cheek in public.
  • You always looking at him when he doesn’t notice and him doing the same.
  • Intertwining fingers.
  • You comforting him when he has nightmares about Bucky dying, or from when he went under the ice.

“It’s alright Steve, it was just a nightmare… It’s alright…”

  • Disney movie marathons.
  • Bone crushing hugs.
  • Gentle hugs.
  • Breathing in each other’s smell while hugging.
  • Showering each other in kisses.
  • Date night every week.
  • Spending all of your free time together.
  • Loving that Brooklyn accent of his.
  • He’d compliment you a lot.

“Steve, honey, you’re staring.”
“I know. You’re just so… Beautiful. I can’t even take my eyes off of you.”

  • He loves PDA Forehead kisses, hugs from behind, cheekily squeezing your ass when he thinks no one’s looking.
  • He’d make you sit on his lap a lot which makes the other Avengers teasing you for it.
  • Amazing sex/cuddles.
  • Getting butterflies in your stomach whenever he calls you ‘doll’.
  • Him always holding the door open for you.
  • Watching him workout.
  • Staring at him when he’s shirtless.

(Picture is not mine!!!! I just searched for a picture of a Shirtless Steve Rogers and this one was the best one I could find!!! Link)

“You’re staring again, doll.”

  • Getting clingy before he has to go on a mission.
  • Wearing his shirts when he’s gone.
  • Him looking like a lost puppy when you’re on a mission.
  • Forever cuddling when you/him get back.
  • Calling him “grandpa” just to tease him.
  • Him liking to walk around the city holding your hand or with an arm around your shoulders.
  • A lot of PDA because he’s not afraid to show that he’s in love with you.
  • Slow dancing.
  • Steve telling you everything about his childhood and how he has never loved a woman the way he loves you. (Ever since Peggy)
  • His kisses being soft and gentle, making you feel comfortable in his arms as he’s holding you close.
  • Him pressing his forehead against yours and whispering “I love you” whenever something bad happens. (Like before the battle in Wakanda against Thanos)
  • Tony teasing the hell out of you two.

“Get a room.”
“Shut up Tony.”

  • Becoming best friends with Bucky and Sam.

And laughing whenever either of them gets jealous about you because you’re stealing Steve from him.

  • Burying your face on Steve’s chest while hugging him.

Because he’s tall and big and he loves to give you bear hugs.

  • Him giving you messages after you have a long, tiring day of being an Avenger.
  • Slow and deep sex because he’s all about making love, and not fucking. But when you ask him to he can get a little rough. Or when he just gets back from a rough mission.
  • Glorious shower sex.
  • Riding on the back of his motorcycle with your arms wrapped around his waist.
  • Wrapping your arms around his neck and pulling him in for a breathtaking kiss.
  • Taking baths together when you feel stressed.
  • Tons of hidden hickeys.
  • Cheek kisses whenever Steve gets jealous.
  • Him spoiling you rotten.
  • Steve lights up when he sees you enter the room.

He’ll immediately make room for you, no matter where he’s sitting.

  • He says that he’s too old for you, but you always shut him up with a kiss and you always reassure him that he will never be to old for you, no matter how old he is, whether he’s 100 or 150.
  • Patching each other up when one of you gets hurt on a mission.
  • Constant texting between the two of you when you go on separate missions.
  • Romantic dinners at a “mom and pop” diner.
  • Him telling you that you’re beautiful 24/7.

“You’re so beautiful.”

  • Pizza and beer nights.
  • Challenging him to a drinking game. Losing said drinking game, resulting him to taking you to bed and taking care of you when you wake up with a hangover.
  • Lazy days in.
  • Good morning texts.

Text: “Good morning doll. I hope you had a good night’s sleep. I love you.”

  • Helping him with his electronics whenever he asks you for help.
  • Dancing under the moonlight.
  • Always being partnered up in a mission.
  • Always challenging him to random bets.
  • Sharing a milkshake.
  • Late night conversations in the dark while lying next to each other in bed.
  • Getting teased by the team constantly.
  • Secret glances at each other.
  • I love you’s all the time.

“I love you.”
“I love you too.”

  • Telling him he has a great ass 24/7.

“I know.”

  • Dominant Steve.
  • Quickies in the bathroom.
  • Sweet, dirty words whispered into your ears every night. ;)
  • Him never letting go of you.
  • Him giving you that sideways smile every time he looks in your eyes and realizes how much he loves you.
  • Cuddling with him at night while he tells you stories of his younger years, playing with your hair till you fall asleep.
  • Long kisses after he comes home from a mission, super glad that he’s home safe.
  • Going to jazz clubs and dancing the night away with him.
  • Laying on his chest and wrapping your arms around him, falling asleep with your head falling perfectly in the crook of his neck.
  • Sleeping in his shirts/sweatshirts, even though they end up looking like nightgowns.
  • Him being afraid of losing you.

“I don’t want to lose you…”
“You won’t lose me Steve… I promise.”

  • You two are definitely going to end up getting married.
  • You two being supportive of each other no matter what.

“No matter what your decision is. I will always be on your side.”

  • Cuddling on the couch with a fuzzy blanket.
  • Receiving flowers at random.
  • Stopping arguments between him and Tony.
  • Waiting for him when he’s on missions.
  • His side of Civil War.
  • Helping him and Sam to look for Bucky after the situation in Washington D.C.
  • Going with him to Bucharest and to Bucky’s apartment.
  • Fighting alongside him during the battle against Thanos.
  • Both of you being relieved to see the other after the snap…

title: Anything Else Is Outside - Chapter 21
body:
One Step Closer

“Are you sure you don’t want to stay here?”

“Yes. I’ll leave the keys with the gatekeeper..”

“Fine. I’ll call you when I get there, ok?”

“Yeah, have a nice trip, Chris.”

“Take care, babe. I’ll miss you.”

“It’s only four days…I’ll be waiting for you”

They kiss and Chris goes to the airport, leaving Harper in his couch. She didn’t have much to get together but she wasn’t ready to leave, so she stayed a bit longer in his home before getting her things and leaving to Jared’s. The place is a little studio with a tiny kitchen and fewer windows than she likes, but well, it’s not like she has many choices. She’s not going to stay in Chris’ place alone, it feels wrong. Everything feels kind of wrong today.

Leaving to work, she’s in the elevator when it stops at the 5th floor. When the doors open, Sebastian was there. “Harper?”

“Hey. Hi.” They hug and he kisses her cheek. “What you’re doing here?”

“I live here. What are you doing here?”

“Chris went to Cali and I came to stay in my cousin’s apartment. 7th floor.”

“Really? That’s nice. How are you?”

“Good, I’m good. What about you?” They haven’t talk after the night at the karaoke, but she feels at ease with him and it was good to see him again.

“I’m tired, to be honest. I have a photoshoot now…but what I really wanted was to stay in bed all day.”

“Oh, poor boy, if it helps, I can offer you dinner. Bring Emmy.”

“ Tonight?”

“Yes. 704. Let me give you my number” she says holding her hand out to take his phone to enter her number. After this, they get to the ground floor and says goodbye, going their own ways.

With the band, things were a bit more stressful today, since the guitarist didn’t practice any of the things she had told him to do yesterday. It took forever for her to be satisfied with the sound they were creating but eventually, she calls it a day and send them on their way.

She’s back at the building entering Jared’s studio when she gets a text from Chris.

This mountain hates me.

Why?

It’s way harder than Park City.

Have fun ;)

I’ll go to the bar with the guys and call you before going to sleep.

Ok. Bye.

After organizing everything she needs to do the salmon risotto she likes, she looks at the phone and there’s a text from Sebastian.

Hey, still up for tonight?

Sure. I’m cooking, are you home? Is Emmy with you?

I’m home. She’s not coming, she already had plans.

Ok, well, you can come up and help me then.

It took a minute for him to knock on the door. He came with wine and a box of cookies with chocolate chips.

Harper and Chris had totally different nights. While she was laughing and having fun with Sebastian, he was listening to his friend’s thoughts about his blooming relationship. It was not nice. His head was hurting and he feels like picking the first plane to Boston so he could talk with his mother. It’s immature of him, but he can’t think about a way out of this mess. His friends are convinced Harper only wants him for his fame, but that’s not what he feels when they’re together. On the other hand, the guys had never acted like that, so they must be really concerned and based on facts. The only thing he didn’t know is that the guys are only worried cause Adam told them a bunch of lies.

After dinner, Sebastian helps Harper washing the dishes and they sit at the couch to eat the cookies and talk more. Harper tells him about her work and what she was doing with this new band here in NY, he tells her he’s not doing much in the next couple of weeks since he’s been working non-stop and needs some rest.

“This is really good, where did you buy it?”

“There’s a great baking shop around the corner, they have the best cookies! I should not be having this much, though, I’ll have to stay an extra hour at the gym tomorrow to burn this…”

“I was thinking about finding a gym, is yours close by?”

“Yeah, and the owner is a friend of mine, if you want to come with me I can get you a free month..”

“I’m only staying for a month…”

“Well, he doesn’t need to know that.”

She laughs and agrees. Seb stands saying he needs to go and she walks him to the door.

“Thank you for dinner, Harper, it was truly delicious.”

“Thank you for the company, Seb.”

“Gym at 7?”

“Yeah, I have to make sure I have clothes to work out…but yes, I’ll text you if I have some change of plan.”

“Ok. See you tomorrow.” he kisses her cheek and goes away.

Harper was already in bed when Chris starts a facetime with her.

“Hey handsome, how are you?”

“Everything hurts. I’m old.”

“You’re not old. I promise you lots of massage when you get back here.”

“Thank you, babe. How was your day?”

“A lot of work…but it’s nice to be recording. I think we’ll be able to finish some tracks this week. They only have three weeks to do it all so I can’t really try to fix every little thing, you know?”

“Yeah..but you’ll do great. I wanted to see you in my bed. Is your cousin’s flat okay? Do you have anything you need?”

“Yeah, and you know what? It’s in Sebastian’s building!”

“What?”

“Yeah, I was leaving to work and he entered the elevator, do you believe that?”

“Yep.”

“I invited him and Emmy to dinner tonight, but she couldn’t come…It was nice anyway, he’s so sweet”

“He is, isn’t he?”

“I wish you were here, it was nice…I had a lot of fun”

“I’m glad you did. Well, I have to go, I’ll take some pain killer and try to sleep, talk to you in the morning..”

“Ok, good night, sugar, nice dreams”

After hanging up with Harper, Chris puts his head under the pillow. He wants to yell and cry and throw things, but all he does is take big breathes. Maybe Adam is right. Maybe she’s not what he thought. He wants to call her back but he didn’t know what to say, what to ask…maybe meeting someone so soon was a mistake after all.
